EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Font Of Power
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: For each action point spent in this tree, you gain +1 Universal Spell Power and +2 Spell Points.

Effect.DisplayName: Angel of Vengeance: Spell power per action point
Angel of Vengeance: Spell points per action point

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Shield of Condemnation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: Enemies that strike you have a chance of suffering divine condemnation for 20 seconds, increasing their vulnerability to light and alignment-based damage by 10%, and decreasing their fortification by 10%. This debuff stacks up to 5 times, and is dispelled by Bless effects. Cooldown: 1 second.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Aura of Menace
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: You project a 15 meter Aura of Menace, decreasing the saving throws, attack, and armor class of nearby enemies by 2. Cooldown: 1 second

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Summon Archon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: Spell like ability: A small lantern archon hovers over your shoulder and attacks nearby enemies. This archon is indestructible, deals 1 to 3 + caster level light damage every 2 seconds, and uses half of your Light Spell Power and Spell Critical effects for its light beam attacks. The archon will only attack enemies that have already been damaged, and will not attack fascinated or mesmerized foes, and always attacks the enemy with the fewest hit points in range. All threat generated by the archon is applied to you. Cost: 20 spell points. Cooldown: 6 second.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Vengeful Magic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +1% Sacred bonus to Spell Critical chance when below 75% health, a +1 Sacred bonus to your spell DC's when below 50% health, and a +50% Sacred bonus Spell Critical Damage Multiplier with Fire, Force, Light, and Physical damage spells when below 25% health.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Ascendancy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: You gain +2 Charisma and +2 to two skills. Active: You are able to cast a low level spell at will without using spell points. Choose One:

EnhancementSelection.Name: Bolt of the Sun
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain +2 to the Diplomacy and Spellcraft skills, and are able to cast the spell Sun Bolt at will without using spell points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Healing Word
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain +2 to the Diplomacy and Heal skills, and are able to cast the spell Cure Light Wounds at will without using spell points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Light of the Flame
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain +2 to the Intimidate and Heal skills, and are able to cast the spell Searing Light at will without using spell points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Protection of the Blade
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain +2 to the Intimidate and Repair skills, and are able to cast the spell Shield at will without using spell points.

Requirement.Feat: Favored by the Lord of Blades

EnhancementSelection.Name: Stealth of the Hunter
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain +2 to the Hide and Move Silently skills, and are able to cast the spell Invisibility at will without using spell points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Voice of the Deathless
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain +2 to the Spot and Search skills, and are able to cast the spell Command Undead at will without using spell points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Scourge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Whenever you cast a Fire, Force, Light, or Physical damage spell, you gain +3 to your Fire, Force, Light, or Physical Spell Power for 6 seconds. This stacks up to 3/6/10 times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Animus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain On Damaged: You have a [20/50/100]% chance to gain one stack of Scourge.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Smiting I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Fire, Force, Light, and Physical damage spells have an additional 2% chance to critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Angelic Resistance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +1/+2/+3 to all saving throws against Magic.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Inquisition
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1/+2/+3 Concentration, Intimidate, and Will Saves vs Fear.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Just Reward
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you critically hit with a Fire, Force, Light, or Physical damage spell, you gain 3/6/10 Sacred temporary spell points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Spell Power Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to gain a +10/+20/+30 Action Boost bonus to Spell Power for 20/20/30 seconds. Cooldown: 30 seconds. (Action boost, 5 uses per rest)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Angel of Vengeance: Crown of Retribution
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Toggle: You remove your Shield of Condemnation from yourself and transfer it to an ally. The Shield of Condemnation manifests itself on them while they remain within the area of your Aura of Menace. Enemies that strike your ally while this is active take an additional 1d8+1 points of light damage from your divine wrath. This ability can only target another player or a hireling, or a monster which you have personally summoned. Cooldown: 15 seconds.
